ValidationRule.description: Requires an Amount to be entered when the opportunity reaches advanced stages (Value Proposition or later)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Value Proposition") || ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Id. Decision Makers") || ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Perception Analysis") || ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal/Price Quote") || ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiation/Review") || ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"), ISNULL(Amount) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Amount is required when the opportunity stage is Value Proposition or later.
